set(KTX_SOURCES
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/texture.c
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/hashlist.c
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/checkheader.c
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/swap.c
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/memstream.c
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/filestream.c
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/other_include)


file(GLOB HEADERS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/*.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/other_include/KHR/*.h)

SOURCE_GROUP(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} PREFIX "sources" FILES ${KTX_SOURCES} ${HEADERS})

add_library(libktx ${KTX_SOURCES} ${HEADERS})
